alpha.label: ùõº:
alpha.description: The initial hyperparameter for the Dirichlet distribution for document‚Äìtable.

eta.label: ùúÇ:
eta.description: The initial hyperparameter for the Dirichlet distribution for topic‚Äìword.

gamma.label: ùõæ (HDP ony):
gamma.description: The initial concentration coefficient of the Dirichlet Process for table‚Äìtopic. Ignored, if LDA is used.

load.label: Load from:
load.description: Name of the file to load the topic model from. Training will be skipped if a model is selected.

optimize.every.label: Optimize every:
optimize.every.description: The optimization interval for the model parameters, in iterations.

save.label: Save to:
save.description: Name of the file to write the topic model to after training. An empty string will be ignored.

seed.label: Custom seed:
seed.description: Custom seed to be used for random number generation. If zero, a randomized seed will be used.
